text: In fo:region-before and fo:region-after, the overflow="hidden" causes header to be clipped, which was not the case in 0.95.
creator: ddelecroix@mbs-france.net
vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

thanks for your bug report. This is a duplicate of bug #49910 that has been partially fixed. The partial fix should work for you since you're not using reference-orientation. Please try again with FOP trunk if possible and report back if it's not the case.

Thanks,
Vincent

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49910 ***
batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
